name: YesidFaceAuthentication
description: YesidFaceAuthentication is a library that provides an easy-to-use interface for integrating facial recognition into your SwiftUI apps. With support for both front-facing and rear-facing cameras, you can quickly and securely authenticate your users with just a few lines of code. Whether you are building a banking app, a health app, or any other app that requires secure authentication, YesidFaceAuthentication has you covered.
